column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The people have spoken!  Lou Malnati's is the best Chicago style pizza in Chicago.  Prior to our visit to Chicago I did quite a bit of research trying to decide which pizza joint to visit during our stay.  There are so many pizza restaurants to choose from and considering we didn't have a lot of time in Chicago
column2: it wasn't an easy decision.  After asking several locals during our stay
column3: and considering Lou's has been featured on the Food Network and the Travel channel multiple times
column4: Lou's was my choice.  Three things stand out in which I feel makes Lou's a truly unique and superior pie.  The crust
column6: and the tangy tomato flavor sauce.  A truly remarkable pizza.
